title.narrative: 1.4. National and provincial government authorities and civil society have information and instruments to develop and implement child rights monitoring and evaluation systems.

description.narrative: MICS is starting field-work and main findings will be available at the end 2020. Case-Management Information Systems are in place in mostly all country and Provincial Observatories continued to shed light on children and adolescents' situation. SitAn and CPD Evaluation will serve as main input for next CPD. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:20/12/2019

actual.value: 2019:MICS is expected to be finalized on April 2020 and final results (report) will be available on November 2020.
